title: courage collosus should proc when you go under 50% health. reasons inside
body:
and no longer be proced on CC

so you can counterplay it and u know when its gonna proc to deal with the shield. or run away to make it less bad

also u know its procing at 50% in lane and can just back off etc

also prob needs a bit of a nerf value wise. i feel it should be a flat shield so hp behemoths dont abuse it and get to be stronger "just cuz"

replies.body: So you want to change it so every tank can have a pseudo Volibear passive? No thanks.  Just decrease the shield amount a little and it should be fine
have fun never killing tahm kench again
